Question
========

When a variable is normally distributed, the sample mean is a better estimator of the population mean than the sample mean because the sample mean

Answerlist
----------

* Is more effective
* More robust
* Is purer

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* More effective is: Correct
* More robust: Incorrect
* More pure: Incorrect
